text: Phaedon tumidulus, also known as the Celery leaf beetle is a species of leaf beetle in the genus Phaedon. It is associated with umbellifers. ==Description== P. tumidulus adult beetles measure 3.5-4.01 mm in length. They are usually dark green or brassy in colour, but are occasionally blueish. ==References== Category:Beetles described in 1824 Category:Chrysomelinae Category:Beetles of Europe Category:Taxa named by Ernst Friedrich Germar
title: Phaedon tumidulus
